title: Why can I not turn left onto Wrightsville blvd.?
text:
Part of Wrightsville Avenue is a one-way street. It is also part of a
long-range land use planning project by the city. More information is
here:

http://www.ci.wilmington.nc.us/development_services/plans_documents/small_area_plans/wrightsville_avenue_2030.aspx
